mapper.select: WITH TEMP_T AS ( SELECT T2.SDING_PKG_CD , T3.DG_GG_LCT_CD , COUNT(1) AS CNT_SUB FROM ( SELECT D2.PD_CD , D1.SDING_PKG_PD_CD , D4.OG_CD , ( SELECT REQD_DT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = D6.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = D6.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN ) AS REQD_DT /* 철거일자 */ FROM TB_SVPD_SDING_SPP_PLAN_IZ D1 /* 모종배송계획내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ D2 /* 고객서비스AS설치대상내역 */ ON D2.AS_IST_OJ_NO = D1.SDING_SPP_NO INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ D3 /* 고객서비스AS설치배정내역 */ ON D3.CST_SV_ASN_NO = D2.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ D4 /* 월파트너내역 */ ON D4.OG_TP_CD = D3.ICHR_OG_TP_CD AND D4.PRTNR_NO = D3.ICHR_PRTNR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ D5 /* 고객서비스수행내역 */ ON D5.CNTR_NO = D2.CNTR_NO AND D5.CNTR_SN = D2.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL D6 /* 계약관계-(모종패키지 계약과 결합된) 웰스팜계약 */ ON D6.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO = D2.CNTR_NO AND D6.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN = D2.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL D7 /* 계약상세-웰스팜 */ ON D7.CNTR_NO = D6.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO AND D7.CNTR_SN = D6.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL D8 /* 상품각사속성상세 */ ON D8.PD_CD = D2.PD_CD WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.ITM_IOST_DV_CD = '1' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D3.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('00', '10') /* 작업대기, 진행중 */ AND D4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D4.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D5.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '101' /* 정상 */ AND D6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D6.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '216' /* 모종결합(웰스팜+모종) */ AND D7.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D7.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD <> '303' /* 계약취소 */ AND D8.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D8.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'SPP' AND D8.PD_PRP_VAL12 = '1' /* 모종 */ AND D1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND D1.OSTR_CNFMDT IS NULL AND D5.REQD_DT IS NULL AND D3.VST_CNFMDT BETWEEN TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{ostrDt}, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1, 'YYYYMMDD' ) AND TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{ostrDt}, 'YYYYMMDD') + ( SELECT SPP_PRD FROM TB_SVPD_SDING_CNR_SPP_DOW_IZ WHERE CNR_OG_CD = D4.OG_CD AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND DOW_DV_CD = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{ostrDt}, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'D') -1 AND #{ostrDt} BETWEEN APY_STRTDT AND APY_ENDDT AND ROWNUM = 1 ) , 'YYYYMMDD' ) UNION ALL SELECT D2.PDCT_PD_CD AS PD_CD , D1.SDING_PKG_PD_CD , D4.OG_CD , ( SELECT REQD_DT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = D7.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = D7.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN ) AS REQD_DT /* 철거일자 */ FROM TB_SVPD_SDING_SPP_PLAN_IZ D1 /* 모종배송계획내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ D2 /* 고객서비스BS대상내역 */ ON D2.CNTR_NO = D1.CNTR_NO AND D2.CNTR_SN = D1.CNTR_SN AND D2.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = D1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD AND D1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '2' AND D1.SDING_SPP_NO = '2' || D2.VST_DUEDT || LPAD(D2.IST_NMN_N, 8, '0') INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ D3 /* 고객서비스BS배정내역 */ ON D3.CST_SV_ASN_NO = D2.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ D4 /* 월파트너내역 */ ON D4.OG_TP_CD = D3.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AND D4.PRTNR_NO = D3.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ D5 /* 고객서비스수행내역 */ ON D5.CNTR_NO = D2.CNTR_NO AND D5.CNTR_SN = D2.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL D6 /* 상품각사속성상세 */ ON D6.PD_CD = D2.PDCT_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL D7 /* 계약관계-(모종패키지 계약과 결합된) 웰스팜계약 */ ON D7.OJ_DTL_CNTR_NO = D2.CNTR_NO AND D7.OJ_DTL_CNTR_SN = D2.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL D8 /* 계약상세-웰스팜 */ ON D8.CNTR_NO = D7.BASE_DTL_CNTR_NO AND D8.CNTR_SN = D7.BASE_DTL_CNTR_SN WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D1.ITM_IOST_DV_CD = '1' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.ASN_OJ_YM >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D3.ASN_OJ_YM >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D3.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD IN ('00', '10') /* 작업대기, 진행중 */ AND D4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D4.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND D5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D5.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD = '101' /* 정상 */ AND D6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D6.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'SPP' AND D6.PD_PRP_VAL12 = '1' /* 모종 */ AND D7.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D7.CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '216' /* 모종결합(웰스팜+모종) */ AND D8.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D8.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD <> '303' /* 계약취소 */ AND D1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND D1.OSTR_CNFMDT IS NULL AND D5.REQD_DT IS NULL AND D3.VST_CNFMDT BETWEEN TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{ostrDt}, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1, 'YYYYMMDD' ) AND TO_CHAR( TO_DATE(#{ostrDt}, 'YYYYMMDD') + ( SELECT SPP_PRD FROM TB_SVPD_SDING_CNR_SPP_DOW_IZ WHERE CNR_OG_CD = D4.OG_CD AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND DOW_DV_CD = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{ostrDt}, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'D') -1 AND #{ostrDt} BETWEEN APY_STRTDT AND APY_ENDDT AND ROWNUM = 1 ) , 'YYYYMMDD' ) ) T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_SDING_PKG_ITM_IZ T2 /* 모종패키지품목내역 */ ON T2.SDING_PD_CD = T1.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_SDING_CNR_SPP_DOW_IZ T3 /* 모종센터배송요일내역 */ ON T3.CNR_OG_CD = T1.OG_CD WHERE T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T3.DOW_DV_CD = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{ostrDt}, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'D') -1 AND T1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND T3.DG_GG_LCT_CD = #{dgGgLctCd} GROUP BY T2.SDING_PKG_CD, T3.DG_GG_LCT_CD ) , TEMP_CNT AS ( SELECT D1.GDS AS SDING_PKG_CD , NVL(D2.EXCD_QTY, 0) AS EXCD_QTY , NVL(D2.SPMT_QTY, 0) AS SPMT_QTY FROM ( SELECT CD_VLD_VAL AS GDS FROM T_CMZ_CD_D WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND CD_ID = 'SDING_PKG_CD' ) D1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_SDING_PKG_QTY_CTR_IZ D2 /* 모종패키지수량조정내역 */ ON D2.SDING_PKG_CD = D1.GDS AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DG_GG_LCT_CD = #{dgGgLctCd} AND D2.OSTR_DUEDT = #{ostrDt} ORDER BY D1.GDS ) SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SDING_PKG_CD', D1.SDING_PKG_CD, #{session.langId}) AS SDING_PKG_NM /* 패키지명 */ , D1.SDING_PKG_CD /* 패키지코드 */ , NVL(D2.CNT_SUB, 0) AS OSTR_QTY /* 출고수량 */ , D1.EXCD_QTY /* 제외수량 */ , D1.SPMT_QTY /* 추가수량 */ FROM TEMP_CNT D1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TEMP_T D2 ON D2.SDING_PKG_CD = D1.SDING_PKG_CD ORDER BY D1.SDING_PKG_CD
